Content.Text:
Something's wrong. You suddenly feel
really sick. Better lie down for a bit.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>! I'm coming in!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>. I've come to see you!<RED>∀</RED> Do
you want to go out on a date?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>? Is something wrong?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Glad to hear you're fine! Let's go.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The cake they have there is totally 
fabulous, too. I'll pick some up for
you next time, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
<MYNAME>, are you sure nothing's wrong?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You really seem to be distracted by
something. You don't seem all that
cheerful, either!
Actually, I'm feeling kinda sick...
Nothing's wrong

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
O-Oh no! Quick, let's get you home,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, how are you feeling?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You're sorry it's ruining our date,
is that it?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Don't worry about that! Taking care of
you at a time like this is just another
aspect of being with someone!
<PAGE>
I'm actually really sorry that you
pushed yourself to go along with me when
you were feeling ill, too!
<PAGE>
You can rely on me sometimes, okay? If
you ever need some TLC just tell me!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's give it a try right now, <MYNAME>.
Is there anything you want me to do?
Make me something to eat
Nothing

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No problem! You just wait here and I'll
be right back.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, here's the food you asked for.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Seeing as you aren't feeling very well
I'll spoon feed you. Open wide!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's good? I'm glad to hear that! Let
me feed you some more.
...There!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's all of it. Now just take it easy.
I'll tidy these things up, you just
sleep.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What did I just say? If you need
anything you only have to ask!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you are sure, anyway. I'll just let
you get some sleep.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'll just hold your hand until you fall
asleep.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you okay to be up and about
now?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't have to thank me! I was glad
to be able to nurse you.
<PAGE>
I'd better be getting home. Make sure
you get to bed early tonight!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Are you sure?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I believe you, of course! Let's go for
a walk.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>! <MYNAME>, are you okay?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>! You're alive!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I was so so so so worried! If you aren't
feeling well then you should have told
me!
<PAGE>
I'll get very angry if you do anything
like this again!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just so long as you understand. I think
a little color is coming back to your
face, too. Phew!
<PAGE>
I'd better be getting home. Make sure
you get to bed early tonight!
